comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: This is actually the Manhattan Bridge, not the Brooklyn Bridge, although it too bridges Manhattan and Brooklyn over the East River.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Thanks again, TVL1970! You are correct. This is the Manhattan Bridge, not the Brooklyn Bridge. We will work to update our descriptive data on this image.

Jerry (U.S. National Archives)

comment.author: 81905123@N00
comment._content: Yes, the Manhattan Bridge....and I'll be riding this train back home in about an hour!

comment.author: 48949874@N08
comment._content: This is definitely the Manhattan Bridge! I have been on that bridge and on the Brooklyn Bridge too many times not to know the difference.
